chapter.pericope: A Prayer for Deliverance from Enemies

ul.li1: titleFor the music director. Of David. To bring to remembrance.The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm; the English verse number is reduced by one
1O God, make haste to deliver me.
O Yahweh, make haste to help me.
Let them be repulsed and humiliated
3let them turn back because of their shame,
4Let them rejoice and be glad in you,
Let them say continually, “God is great!”
You are my help and my deliverer.
